title: BF2 SOLD Pennant Vaughn & Archer 1916 Ferguson Bakery
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: BF2 SOLD Pennant Vaughn & Archer 1916 Ferguson Bakery
posts.post_content:
Offered here are two 1916 BF2 Ferguson Bakery Pennants. Both are Cubs. Jim Hippo Vaughn and Jimmy Archer. 
Vaughn is a quite nice cream colored Pennant with an excellent crease free photo. A very nice example
Archer is a desirable orange color . The photo has some light creasing and the edge shows hints of stitching 
Vaughn 59.99 net plus 6.00 shipping with tracking sold
Archer 39.99 net plus 6.00 shipping with tracking sold
